Text: Thank you for completing the series. Just to keep up with any of your updates and releases, is the "scanlations" thread on Kaskus still active or has is moved?

Np, next up is Butterscotch 1-2, then I can get back to "regular" Cinebook scans, and the last 4 Valhalla books :)
And the kaskus thread is still running :)

Sorry, I dont speak dutch, so can't help on that one...and with my current projects, I'm already busy for years.
I got Valhalla 12-15, Loisel's Peter Pan 1-6, Little Spirou 3-12 and 14-15, whenever I get time between "normal" scans, and RL :)
Wow, we should all pinch in and pay this guy an escort.
Well Zippetta, at least im done with Manara now, all 6 albums done :)
